reviewText: At long last - there is a cartoon out there in which characters speak in correct English. No one says "gonna" or "wanna". I only hope that it is not too late for my child after 2 years of watching Mickey and Dora.
Great! My daughter loves Peppa Pig and the episodes are great she loved them and there at a great price!

My 20-month daughter is a huge Peppa fan.  Amazon Video Library really helps - I can call it up on any computer through my Amazon account, super convenient and more environmentally friendly that I don't need a CD with a case.
great for the little ones. My 2 yr old daughter adores Peppa Pig. I think it is a great buy and definitely a favorite in our house.
Hooray!!! My 2 year old daughter loves Peppa. Having Peppa on our Kindle fire allows for an enjoyable lunch or dinner out for all.
Kept kids entertained during the hurricane. Harmless entertainment which provides hours of fun for all the family to enjoy.  Recommend

This was a great compilation of Peppa Pig shorts. I originally bought this for my 2 year old, bit I often find myself enjoying it as much as he does. I wish Amazon would have more Peppa Pig videos available.
My kid taught me that one touch purchases are not for parents with young children!  But they do like this and all other Peppa's as well.
Bought it for my daughter. She loves reading it.
Fabulous
The kids love Peppa Pig. And it's actually pretty entertaining for adults as well. 5-Stars!

My toddler absolutely loves Peppa and it's a cute show I don't despise, so I give it 5 stars. Way less obnoxious than others out there, although I do wish there were more "lessons" like they offer in Daniel Tiger...sometimes the pigs are kinda bratty and mean to each other, which doesn't set an ideal example. Regardless, my daughter loves it and I'm fine with it.
Baby love it play all day
The kids love it
Thin little book but charlie loves it so I love it.
Granddaughter loves Peppa Pig & watches this dvd over & over.
It was great
My kids love peppy pig
Our 18 month old daughter LOVES peppa!  Any of these Peppa movies are worth the money!
Our granddaughters love these funny and kind tales.  The characters are warm toward one another and stories always end in giggles.
same as above price and freezing up
Cute
Who doesn't love Peppa. Even after my little one stops watching I will continue to watch Peppa.
my grandkids love peppa pig!!! they watch it everyday on tv. they even have me (nana) watching it!!!
A+
3 yr old loves Peppa ...:)
Grandbaby loves Peppa!
Rented it once when babysitting my niece, bought it the next time. It is one of her favorites.
Anything Peppa my daughter loves.
My grandchildren love peppa pig.
Not much to say. Just the same as the tv showThe kids love it ...
My daughter this show it's cute
PepA Pig, need I say more...
Our family loves this cheeky little piggy. ;)
my almost 3 yr old granddaughter loved watching Peppa Pig.
My kids love it.  Period. Of course I'm tired of hearing the theme music.
My son loves these cartoons and we watch them on our Kindle Tablet!
love this show.

My Grand-daughter just adores Peppa Pig and Peppa's family. I sit and watch the cartoons with her and I too love watching Peppa Pig, I just love listening to her talk. Peppa Pig Flying Kite is just one of her favorite episodes to watch. I just recently brought my Grand-daughter a Peppa Pig dress, which she just adores, and I brought my Grand-son A George plush doll and a George T-shirt. I will be buying my Grand-daughter more Peppa Pig Video's to watch and clothing, Toys and other accessories.  I recommend Peppa Pig cartoon video's for all the little one's and big one's!!
I really can't rate it. I haven't watched it. I bought it for my 2 yr old grandson and thought it was a cd but it's a insta movie. If I had known that I would have never bought it.
We love Peppa Pig!
my grand daughter loves this series
My 18 month old loves peppa!  Get series, teaches manners!
My granddaughter loves all of peppa pig!
Our kids favorite! -And not annoying for adults. We love Peppa!!!!
great series for 3-4 yr olds
love it. couldn't be happier :)
This is another great group of Peppa Pig stories! Peppa and her family are very entertaining for both young and old.
I'm sure it's user error. I'm a complete idiot with operating the Kindle. Go ahead, Kindle fans, and tell me how easy it is to use a Kindle.
Peppa's awesome - one of the kids shows that my daughter, my husband and I can agree on. And I'm 'a bit of an expert' when it comes to kids shows...
Good but not as good as the muddy puddles one. That one is way funnier for kids and adults as well.
My kids love peppa pig. I don't find it annoying like many of the shows they like to watch. This is a great video that my kids have watched many times and might never get tired of.
Great show for the children. My son enjoy pepper pig and watches it over and over. He has fun with daddy pig
My 4 year old son LOVES this show, and it is a very good show for him to watch, but for 10 minutes, it is a little pricey for what you get.

This is the one show my daughter loves. The best thing about this one is that it's one continuous playing movie instead of having to re start after every two 5 min episodes. My daughter is happy, I don't mind watching this simple little show and my kindle gets closer and closer to being my one and a half year olds. Guess I'll be getting a new one for me.

My 2 year old loves Peppa and George!  I love that I was able to download this onto my kindle so I don't have to be connected to wifi to play.  There are a good amount of sketches and they play straight through so I don't have to press play after each one.
Great content for toddlers. Always appropriate and friendly. Great educational content. Often funny for everyone. Favorite of my 2 year old daughter.

My son loves, loves, loves Peppa, probably because he enjoys making pig snorts whenever he sees the characters.  Since the network that broadcasts this show occasionally changes their schedule, we were glad to pick up this DVD, so we'd always have the option to put the show on on those days when nothing else will do.

Nothing really new here, but if you've a fan of the show, this is that show.  Buy it and you too can watch episode after episode after episode...

I bought this to watch on my Roku.  I paid for the whole season because my kids are big Peppa fans.  But a couple of weeks later, it had vanished completely.  I guess amazon removed it?  I don't know.  All I know is that I bought a whole season, my kids watched two episodes, and now it's gone.  Total rip off.

I'm not sure why these pigs make my daughter laugh so much.  Maybe it's English humor.  Great for 3-4 year old kids.  They keep on asking for more.  One thing I do like is there is more than one story per purchase.  Definitely, would recommend!
My daughter loves it and it seems to be a good children's program, as far as teaching the use of manners and respect. Great for toddlers and young children.
My son, who's 5, loves this series.  Video quality and audio is good.  Very good stories appropriate for any age and very funny.  I only wish new episodes would be made in the near future.
Peppa Pig and her family are delightful! This is a very family oriented animated British feature for children. They have lots of fun as a family!

my kids, 2 and 4, LOVE peppa and george. these episodes are about 5 minutes each...which is really nice because you don't have to commit to 15 min or 30 min or more program that your kids will want to finish. The shows themes are simple and everyday situations, but so cute and even make adults laugh! we all like peppa pig. those cute english accents are really fun to listen to as well.
This is exactly what my granddaughter likes! she is at an age that really likes Peppa. Yeah Peppa Pig! Snort!
I rented this for my daughter.  She is a fan of the show and absolutely loved this.  There are several shows included in the rental.
my five year old son still loves Peppa and George. Our favorite expression is "if you want to jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots."
like very much
Grandkids love Peppa Pig. They watch this dvd over and over.
My niece loves it
Grandchildren love Peppa Pig.
Good movie for a toddler.
kids like peppa pig
My granddaughter loves Peppa Pig
A
Very cute dvd!!! BIG HIT with my 2yr old daughter!
